description: Convolution of A000108 (Catalan) with A000351 (powers of 5).
comments: i) Homogeneous recursion: a(n) = (3*(3*n+1)/(n+1))*a(n-1)-(10*(2*n-1)/(n+1))*a(n-2), a(-1) := 0, a(0)=1, n >= 1. ii) Hypergeometric 2F1 form: 2*a(n) = 5^(n+1)-binomial(2*(n+1), n+1)*hypergeom([ -n-1,1 ],[ 1/2 ],-1/4).
formula: a(n) = sum(C(k)*5^(n-k), k=0..n), C(k)=A000108(k) (Catalan); a(n) = 5*a(n-1)+ C(n), a(0)=1; G.f.: c(x)/(1-5*x), where c(x) = g.f. for Catalan numbers A000108.
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
